subject: CDK tsconfig.cdk.json add include + package.lisa.json prepare
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add `"include": ["lib/**/*", "bin/**/*", "test/**/*"]` to `cdk/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.cdk.json`. Add `"prepare": "husky install || true"` to `cdk/package-lisa/package.lisa.json` force.scripts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `cdk/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.cdk.json` has include array with lib, bin, test globs
- [ ] `cdk/package-lisa/package.lisa.json` force.scripts has prepare: "husky install || true"

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `jq '.force.scripts.prepare' cdk/package-lisa/package.lisa.json && jq '.include' cdk/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.cdk.json`
- expected: `"husky install || true"` and `["lib/**/*", "bin/**/*", "test/**/*"]`
activeForm: Adding CDK include scope and prepare script
